Detailed Description

This module implements a WebSocket client interface as documented by RFC 6455 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6455). The current version of the WebSockets protocol implemented here is version 13. Up to date registry information regarding new extensions, protocols, result codes, etc. can be found at http://www.iana.org/assignments/websocket/websocket.xml.

Note
While the standard supports up to a 64-bit frame size, this implementation only supports up to 32-bit frame sizes.
Todo:
  • Sec-WebSocket-Protocols support
  • Implement server support (Accept/Listen)
